channel.title: RunePeak - 474/498
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/547/69697694.png/][IMG]http://img547.imageshack.us/img547/2724/69697694.png[/img][/URL]
[i]As I do like both 474/498 eras, I've decided to create a mash up of the both, RunePeak. RunePeak will be a server compact with a lot of precise content, and good performance from the back end to the rear end (yes, lol it out..). My plans with RunePeak is to get through the development stages, host beta, then host the finished product. This isn't going to be a remake, but I will add skills, minigames and extra custom content.[/i]
[size=13pt][b]Development team:[/b][/size] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=511718]Int Bauk[/url] - Server/Client Developer
[b][size=13pt]Client development:[/size][/b] I'm not all that amazing with Client(s), but expect to see some nice updates.
[ul][li]Real 474/498 IDK/Identity Kit added (female/male)[/li] [li]474 maps, objects, animations, gfx(s) and npc's[/li] [li]A 498 mash up gameframe[/li][/ul]
[b][size=13pt]Server development:[/size][/b] Soon.
[b][size=11pt]Combat Beta stages:[/size][/b] Peak times, sorry I mean RunePeak will going into beta when I've completed progression with combat, dates will be released. [b][size=11pt]Content Beta stages:[/size][/b] Soon.
[b][size=13pt]Extra(s):[/size][/b] 474/498 IDK: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AKcmiAs3jvg
[b][size=13pt]Media:[/size][/b] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/706/imagepkb.png/][IMG]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/7318/imagepkb.png[/img][/URL]
Thread status: updating.

item.title: RunePeak - 474/498
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

As I do like both 474/498 eras, I’ve decided to create a mash up of the both, RunePeak.
RunePeak will be a server compact with a lot of precise content, and good performance from the back end to the rear end (yes, lol it out…).
My plans with RunePeak is to get through the development stages, host beta, then host the finished product.
This isn’t going to be a remake, but I will add skills, minigames and extra custom content.

[size=13pt]Development team:[/size]
Int Bauk - Server/Client Developer

[size=13pt]Client development:[/size]
I’m not all that amazing with Client(s), but expect to see some nice updates.

[ul][li]Real 474/498 IDK/Identity Kit added (female/male)[/li]
[li]474 maps, objects, animations, gfx(s) and npc’s[/li]
[li]A 498 mash up gameframe[/li][/ul]

[size=13pt]Server development:[/size]
Soon.

[size=11pt]Combat Beta stages:[/size]
Peak times, sorry I mean RunePeak will going into beta when I’ve completed progression with combat, dates will be released.
[size=11pt]Content Beta stages:[/size]
Soon.

474/498 IDK:
